price: 20. Ir bus papūsta į Ragą - Dieną, apie kurią buvo įspėta (t. y. Prikėlimo Dieną).
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
